How can the structural insights from Alp: By highlighting critical regions for binding and stability, guiding the identification of effective nanobody candidates.
By determining the metabolic pathways of bacterial pathogens.

How does AlphaFold-Multimer contribute t: It models the interactions within the FtsQBL complex, identifying key interaction sites and conformational similarities.
It sequences the DNA of the FtsQBL complex to identify genetic mutations.
It synthesizes chemical compounds that can inhibit the FtsQBL complex.

Developing new computational algorithms for protein structure prediction.
Investigating the genetic basis of antibiotic resistance in bacterial pathogens.
Exploring the role of the divisome in viral replication processes.
